title: Traitor within: cancer
creator_credit: George Gordon and John Sutherland Productions
brief_description: An animated film, made for the American Cancer Society, which tells the story of cancer cell growth, the lawless multiplication of gangster cells, the spreading of cancer by the lymph nodes, and the possibilities of controlling and curing cancer by early diagnosis, through the use of surgery, X-ray and radium.
